New Records: David Warner maintained his perfect record of taking a wicket in each of the 22 World Cup matches he's played in.
Key Match Events: David Warner scored a sensational 163 for man of the match honours.
Shaheen Afridi took a five-wicket haul.
Adam Zampa took his second successive four-wicket haul.
Mitchell Starc maintained his perfect record of taking a wicket in each of the 22 World Cup matches he's played in.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to bowl.
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner downplayed concerns about a groin injury, stating it was just cramps.
Mark Taylor believes Australia are 'finding their groove' but still have room for improvement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia's next match will be against the Netherlands in Delhi on Wednesday.
